title: SGC N172 Old Judge Keefe and Richardson FS ***SOLD***
author: kkkkandp

posts.post_title: SGC N172 Old Judge Keefe and Richardson FS ***SOLD***
posts.post_content:
This card checks a bunch of boxes for Old Judge collectors interested in subsets. 1887 card with "hot dog" logo? Check. Hall of Famer? Check. Horizontal pose? Check. Two players? Check. Both players mentioned by name in the label? Check. This card is a veritable cornucopia of variations!

Graded by SGC as 10 - Poor (for light glue stains on the reverse, off-centeredness, and light wrinkles), this card of HOFer Tim Keefe and teammate Danny Richardson still presents quite well. 

$2250 net to me for Priority Mail/insured delivery to you. ***SOLD*** 
email [url]kkkkandp@aol.com[/url] with questions.

Thanks, Tom! 

Hopefully, a prospective buyer will also see its attractiveness! :D
